aka: Terra Incognita: Luka dan bisa kubawa berlari (ii)‎

writer.name: 蒂莫特斯·安格万·库斯诺 Timoteus Anggawan Kusno

director.name: 蒂莫特斯·安格万·库斯诺 Timoteus Anggawan Kusno

trans_title: Terra Incognita: Luka dan bisa kubawa berlari (ii)‎
introduction: The artist’s re-enactment of mass mobilization during the succession to the Indonesian regime is accompanied by a narrator’s recitation of an anachronistic poem. The production of this work of fiction reveals the overlapping and obscuring of memories, resulting in a cacophony of voices and distortion of memory. Produced by Han Nefkens Foundations-Loop Barcelona.源自：https://www.schermodellarte.org/en/film/terra-incognita/
